text: (nabiye!) oba mese pavasanu: “minisune!(oba kumana desayaka aya vuvada, kumana samuhayaka aya vuvada), ættenma ma oba siyallantama allah visin evana lada ek dutayeki. ahashida, bhumiyehida rajyaya ohutama ayatya!(næmadumata himi) deviya ohu misa, vena kisivekut næta. ohuma pana denneya. maranayatada pat karanneya. ebævin ema allahvada, liyannata dænumak næti nabi vana ohuge dutayavada oba visvasa karanu mænava!ohu pava allahvada, ohuge ayavanda visvasa karanneya. ebævin oba rju margaya at kara gænima pinisa ohuvama oba anugamanaya karanu
